Guys do not let your chick talk you into this terrible movie made by women for women. Ita the most predictable piece of garbage I've ever seen. Luckily my girl acknowledged that but what terrible chick flick isn't horrible and predictable. It takes women's negative look on relationships and pounds it in your face. Every insecurity a woman has is brought to light in every scene. It deals with womens age and how men can get hot girls at almost any age and women get old and saggy after 30 which isn't true but this movie will have your chick hot or not dreading life and looking at you like you've already cheated or are planning on leaving her as soon as she has a kid and that's what the men do they leave their miserable lives with kids and a home for better things. Thr two main characters try and bypass this condumdrum by having a kid even though they are just good friends. This ingenious plan works and works well untill the woman screws it up and has a mid life crisis and realizes that she has a family already. So she gets drunk and guilts the guy whose daring Megan Fox into leaving her for her old bag of bones and why? Why would anyone leave Megan fox oh bc of the kid that's right. This movie sucks. Thr guy had Megan fucking fox and he leaves her for thr old maid. The old maid being the writer director and producer of the film so she could create this fantasy and nobody could say shit about it. The other characters whose lives were miserable bc they had kids and one kid each at that not like they had it real hard but bc they had one kid and this was so hard they lost their marriages. There's a scene where the couple with one kid has the single people over for dinner and theres this fake chaos where the family with one kid just apparently is living in chaos bc they have one fucking kid. He is a little add shit that needs to slipped a roofie but I'm sorry one kid isn't like that crazy and isn't so crazy that your life is just ruined. All I know is this movie will leave your chick miserable with herself. Even though the bag of bones got the young stud away from the goddess Megan fox it still left my girlfriend just in tears practically and she's 23 and smoking hot. She's the Megan fox well she's close.  All I know is that no man in his 20's would leave Megan fox for a woman in her way late thirties  oat likely early forties just bc their dumbass experiment didn't turn out the way the woman wanted. I fucking hated this movie and give it a big fat fuxking F! It sucks a huge huge cock. Only watch it if you want to kill yourself and your dreams.
